items.title: Profit Split Rule for Realized Option Gains
items.summary: When options close in profit, split gains into configurable buckets so profits are intentionally recycled instead of treated as undifferentiated cash.
details: Add config controls for split percentages (example: 60% option reserve, 40% equity deployment).
Apply split only to realized option PnL events.
Log each split decision and resulting allocations in metadata/reporting.

items.title: Option Take-Profit and Stop-Loss Rules
items.summary: Add explicit options exit logic beyond underlying signal weakness.
details: Support configurable profit target and loss cutoff by contract.
Include time-based decay exit (close near expiry if thesis not materializing).
Track rule-triggered exits separately in reports.

items.title: Mark-to-Market Option Valuation in Account Equity
items.summary: Include open option market value in account equity to improve sizing and risk controls.
details: Fetch mid/mark prices for open contracts each cycle.
Include option market value in equity budgeting and drawdown checks.
Fallback safely if quote data is unavailable.

items.title: Daily Loss and Drawdown Kill Switches
items.summary: Pause new entries when intraday or rolling drawdown thresholds are breached.
details: Add max daily loss percentage and max weekly drawdown controls.
Allow existing positions to de-risk while blocking fresh opens.
Expose kill-switch status prominently on dashboard.

items.title: Execution Quality and Slippage Guards
items.summary: Reject low-liquidity trades and enforce spread/slippage limits before order submission.
details: Add minimum option open interest/volume filters.
Add maximum bid/ask spread threshold for options.
Record skipped orders with structured reasons.

items.title: Market Regime-Aware Allocation
items.summary: Dynamically adjust equity/options allocation based on volatility and macro regime.
details: Classify risk-on/risk-off regimes from market and macro indicators.
Map regimes to conservative/neutral/aggressive risk presets.
Backtest regime transitions before production rollout.

items.title: Post-Trade Attribution Dashboard
items.summary: Break down PnL contribution by momentum, news, AI signals, macro model, and source types.
details: Add daily and weekly attribution tables.
Link attribution to decision journal outcomes.
Surface recurring failure patterns in advisor reports.

items.title: Direct PostgreSQL Persistence Layer
items.summary: Write portfolio, activity, metadata, and control logs directly to PostgreSQL while retaining JSONL fallback.
details: Introduce schema migrations and retention policy.
Keep file fallback for outage resilience.
Enable SQL-based dashboard queries for historical analytics.

items.title: Historical Backtesting Framework
items.summary: Reproduce strategy logic across historical windows before deploying parameter changes.
details: Use point-in-time data assumptions where feasible.
Generate metrics for CAGR, drawdown, hit-rate, and turnover.
Integrate with quarterly advisor recommendations.

items.title: Advisor Auto-Simulation for Proposed Setting Changes
items.summary: Before each quarter, run what-if simulations for suggested weight/threshold changes.
details: Compare baseline and candidate parameter sets.
Rank suggestions by expected risk-adjusted improvement.
Attach results to quarterly advisor reports.

items.title: Security Hardening for Secrets and Access
items.summary: Move credentials to managed secret storage and enforce least privilege on dashboard access.
details: Integrate cloud secret manager for API keys.
Add dashboard authentication and role-based permissions.
Audit and rotate credential usage regularly.

items.title: Observability and Alerting Expansion
items.summary: Ship metrics and logs to centralized monitoring with actionable alerts.
details: Expose key health metrics (cycle duration, signal count, trade count, API errors).
Alert on stale cycles, repeated order failures, and data ingestion failures.
Add uptime and backup verification dashboards.
